lom:description.lom:string: Intel's website for their "World Ahead" program with the goal of "introducing the digial world to the next billion new users. Intel is investing $1 Billion over the next 5 years to enhance lives by providing access to uncompromised technology for anyone, anywhere." The program has 4 threads: (1) Accessibility: Providing the foundation for technology usage and ownership. (2) Education: Preparing students for success in the global economy through programs, resources and technolgy. (3) Connectivity: Extending broadband Internet access to developing countries. (4) Content: Promoting locally relevant content and services that expand opportunities.

lom:contribute.lom:entity: BEGIN:VCARD VERSION:3.0 SOURCE:http://www.smete.org UID:0F2E95E4-D3BE-435B-828B-A9331A038EA2 N:Intel Corporation;Intel World Ahead Program;null;; FN:Intel World Ahead Program Intel Corporation END:vCard
